revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Light source | name = Burning barrel | class = StrifeBurningBarrel | game = Strife | doomednum = 70 | convid = 238 }}[[Classes]]: StrifeBurningBarrel
{{desc}}In Strife1.wad, the sprites are actually named BARL* and are [[Sprite renaming|renamed at load-time]] by ZDoom. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR StrifeBurningBarrel { {{Property|Radius}} 16 {{Property|Height}} 48 +{{Flag|SOLID}} States { Spawn: BBAR ABCD 4 Bright Loop } }
